hero.title: Welcome to RegMan
hero.subtitle: RegMan is your comprehensive student management system. Easily manage academic plans, courses, enrollments, and more with our intuitive platform.

manageCourses.title: Manage Courses
manageCourses.body: Create, update, and organize courses effortlessly.

trackProgress.title: Track Progress
trackProgress.body: Monitor academic progress and stay on top of your goals.

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.body: Gain insights into academic and platform data.

about.title: About RegMan
about.body: We are a team of passionate developers who have seen firsthand how fragmented and complicated university management systems can be. RegMan is our innovative solution designed to streamline academic workflows, making it easier than ever to manage courses, enrollments, schedules, and academic performance. Our goal is to provide students, instructors, and administrators with a seamless, intuitive platform that brings everything together in one place, so you can focus on what really matters: learning and teaching.
